title: When All That's Left Is You
text:
When All That's Left Is You is the first album created by <a href="Quietdrive">Quietdrive</a>, released through <a href="Epic%20Records">Epic Records</a>.
The <a href="Single%20%28music%29">single</a> "Rise from the Ashes" is featured on the soundtrack of <a href="EA%20Sports">EA Sports</a>' "<a href="NHL%2007">NHL 07</a>".
All of the songs on the album were written by lead singer Kevin Truckenmiller and Quietdrive, with the exception of Track 9, which is the cover of "Time After Time" by Cyndi Lauper.
Track listing.
All songs written by <a href="Kevin%20Truckenmiller">Kevin Truckenmiller</a>, except for where noted.
